name: Goat-Man
movement: 40 feet walking speed for quick engagement
description: The Goat-Man has a muscular build typical of a beast, combining the features of a goat with a humanoid form, including prominent horns and a fierce demeanor.
memorable: Its ability to charge at foes and potentially knock them prone makes it a dangerous adversary in combat.
goals: Seeks to dominate and instill fear in its surroundings, often engaging in brutal physical confrontations.
relations: Could be encountered with other chaotic evil creatures, perhaps serving as a minion or underling.
environment: Commonly found in wild, untamed, or desolate areas, often lurking near forests or hills.
strengths: Excellent at grappling, delivering powerful slams, and proficient in stealth.
weaknesses: Weak mental capacity and susceptible to magical attacks targeting mental fortitude.
attacks: Delivers bites and strong slams, capable of stunning enemies and knocking them down.
most_powerful_ability: Charge allows the Goat-Man to deal extra damage and potentially knock targets prone.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, allowing for stealthy movements and agile maneuvers.
additional_information: Immune to charmed and frightened conditions
Solid endurance with high hit points
Relies on physical strength and speed in combat
Possesses strong attacks with the potential for stunning effects
Lacks social skills due to low charisma
test_queries: agile creature that knocks down foes
brutal melee attacker with strong physical traits
chaotic evil monster with powerful slam attacks
